name: INStartCallIntent
desc: A request to start an audio or video call with one or more users.

items.name: init(callRecordFilter: INCallRecordFilter?, callRecordToCallBack: INCallRecord?, audioRoute: INCallAudioRoute, destinationType: INCallDestinationType, contacts: [INPerson]?, callCapability: INCallCapability)
items.desc: Creates a start call intent object with the specified parameters.

items.name: var callCapability: INCallCapability
items.desc: The type of call the user initiated.

items.name: var destinationType: INCallDestinationType
items.desc: The type of call to place.

items.name: var audioRoute: INCallAudioRoute
items.desc: The audio route the call is using.

items.name: var callRecordFilter: INCallRecordFilter?
items.desc: Filters specified by the user to redial a call.

items.name: var callRecordToCallBack: INCallRecord?
items.desc: Details about a call to redial a missed call.

items.name: enum INCallAudioRoute
items.desc: Constants that describe the audio route for the call.
